Data Structures | Macros | Enumerations
Drive
Stratify OS » Device Interface

Detailed Description

This is the interface for accessing drives. The drive can be any external storage device such as an SD card, serial flash chip, etc. Disks are always read/write block devices.

Data Structures

 Drive Info. More...

 Drive Attributes. More...

Enumerations

Macro Definition Documentation

#define I_DRIVE_GETINFO

Gets the drive info (drive_info_t).

#define I_DRIVE_GETVERSION

Gets the driver version.

#define I_DRIVE_ISBUSY

See if the drive is busy. This ioctl call will return greater than one if the device is busy and 0 if drive is not busy.

#define I_DRIVE_SETATTR

Sets the drive attributes (

See also
drive_attr_t).

Enumeration Type Documentation

anonymous enum
Enumerator
DRIVE_FLAG_PROTECT 

Enables driver write protection.

DRIVE_FLAG_UNPROTECT 

Disables driver write protection.

DRIVE_FLAG_ERASE_BLOCKS 

Erases blocks on disk (use start and end to specify which blocks).

DRIVE_FLAG_ERASE_DEVICE 

Erases the drive.

DRIVE_FLAG_POWERDOWN 

Puts the drive in power down mode.

DRIVE_FLAG_POWERUP 

Powers up the driver (after power down).

DRIVE_FLAG_INIT 

Initializes the drive.
